item.title: Configure Development Environment
item.description: Install NVIDIA Development Environment This document describes how to setup NVIDIA full development environment under ubuntu-18.04. Install NVIDIA driver Choose corresponding driver version based on your card series https://www.nvidia.co.jp/Download/index.aspx then, download it. Run installation script $ sudo bash NVIDIA-Linux-x86_64-440.82.run NOTE: ensure that make, gcc and libc header files have been installed in previous, if not, install them as follows, $ sudo apt-get install gcc make build-essential linux-headers-`uname -r` --no-install-recommends Reboot
